Name: Chafer Activity
Description: Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' where (command like '%\microsoft\Taskbar\autoit3.exe' and command like 'C:\wsc.exe%') or (process_path like '%\Windows\Temp\DB\%' and process_path like '%.exe') or ((command like '%\nslookup.exe%' and command like '%-q=TXT%') and parent_process_path like '%\Autoit%') or (command like '%\Service.exe%' and (command like '%i' or command like '%u'))
